thread.title: Trump Is Expected to Approve Release of Classified Surveillance Memo

author: Rebecca Ballhaus
title: Trump Is Expected to Approve Release of Classified Surveillance Memo
text:
WASHINGTON—President Donald Trump is expected to tell Congress as early as Friday that he has approved the release of a classified memo that Republicans allege shows improper surveillance of a onetime Trump campaign aide, a White House official said Thursday.

The official said Mr. Trump made his decision after reviewing the memo and ensuring “it doesn’t give away too much in terms of classification.” The official said the White House doesn’t expect the memo to include any redactions recommended by intelligence officials. “It’s... RELATED VIDEO What People Really Mean When They Say 'Collusion' When it comes to the Russia investigation, the word "Collusion" gets thrown around a lot. But there's not a lot of clarity on what it actually means. Is it illegal? Is it grounds for impeachment? We asked a law professor to explain. Photo Illustration: Drew Evans/The Wall Street Journal.
